localize.text: Do you want to know why it has come to this?
Because You didn’t have faith in yourself.
Faithless actions only result in dreadful deaths.
Do not worry. I shall take you in, for I know everything.
I am you.
I am the only you who realized the only truth and stand on the world itself.
I am you who leave the paths I walked behind and decided to join the world that she wanted to create.
We can do whatever we imagine.
Monsters! Help!
Look! Something’s growing on me! Hahahahaha!!
Behold.
How this loss-riddled world is perfected by us.
The foolish god named rationality ruled this world until now.
No, calling it a god is an overstatement. It is a mere illusion.
We shall drag it down and open everyone’s eyes.
Yes, the world Carmen wanted will come.
Let us create this paradise.
Even the head and the eye are mere humans. They can’t stop us who realized the truth.
You know that everything we saw in this land are only shadows, that you never witnessed the truth until now.
This fruit of redemption will reach everyone’s heart.
The abandoned, the powerful, the rich, the hopeful, everyone.
The tree of human shall reach the root of this world.
Behold,
I declared that you will be free in the end.
